name: quickdapp-monorepo
description: Production-ready boilerplate for vibe-coded and hand-coded web apps.

scripts.lint: bun run --cwd packages/base lint && bun run --cwd packages/variant-web3 lint && bun run --cwd packages/website lint
scripts.build: bun run --cwd packages/base build && bun run --cwd packages/variant-web3 build && bun run --cwd packages/website build && bun run --cwd packages/cli build
